text: the following report contains some
disturbing images
time is only alive because it wasn't he
who answered the door when Isis came
looking for him really good to meet you
we came to meet the young Iraqi in
Lebanon where he's safe at last so this
is where you live now
but earlier this year Isis killed one of
his closest friends can you tell us a
bit about him what home found out after
Isis posted photographs online of the 22
year old who tried to keep his sexuality
secret the images show him about to be
thrown from a building then on the
ground with another man murdered the
same way time heard from a friend that
the fall didn't kill him so he'd been
stoned to death he was a great man
really kind really calm really smart he
got straight A's all the time one day he
was alive active just living his life
and now he's gone the first time I saw
the pictures I really wanted to break
down and what's really disturbing is
that people actually support Isis for
doing this sometimes I have nightmares
being thrown off a building or getting
arrested by Isis or facing the same fate
as my friend
I am runs to try to escape those
nightmares but last summer he says he
was running for his life a friend had
inadvertently outed him to an extremist
who joined Isis a month after taking
over his town they were knocking at his
door
my dad answered the door and they said
to him your son is an infidel and a
homosexual and we have come to apply
God's punishment on him my dad is a
religious man and luckily for me he told
them to come back the next day after he
was sure that the accusation was correct
then he came inside the house and
started screaming
and finally he said if these accusations
are true I will hand you over to them
myself happily and I just stood there
not knowing what to do or how to defend
myself but my mother decided that I
should leave the house immediately and
she worked on getting me out of Iraq for
good it was difficult and often
dangerous if you are known to be gay
before is came wasn't it how much worse
did it become Isis is tracking down gay
men one by one the previous militias in
Iraq used to rape and blackmail gay
people and kill them in horrible ways
but they weren't as professional at
tracking people down now if one gay man
is arrested Isis will go through all
their contacts they're targeting every
gay man and to him says he knows dozens
of gay men who can't leave now living
with the death sentence if they found
out who knows who is next I was lucky to
get out I saved my soul but what about
them will they be lucky enough to
survive and if they survive will they
recover from the trauma of being hunted
there's the view from the top of the
eagle so it looks like that there is not
too much wind soaring and we can see
that really is controlling the flight
the masked Crusader
is easy to spot when he flies through
the streets on this custom-built
three-wheeled Chi bat pod
